channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: China Simulates Blockade of Taiwan in Large-Scale Military Drills
item.description: China is conducting its largest military operations around Taiwan in almost a year, surrounding the island with warplanes and ships. Beijing says the two-day drills, which simulate

item.title: Climate Change Increases Risk of Kidney Disease: Study
item.description: A new study from National Taiwan University says a rise in temperatures significantly increases the chance of diabetes patients developing chronic kidney disease.

item.title: China Military Drills Around Taiwan Biggest Since April 2023
item.description: As China carries out large-scale military operations around Taiwan simulating an attack on and blockade of the country, comparisons are being drawn to similar drills over the last

item.title: Olympic Gymnast Tang Chia-hung Looking To Swing His Way to Gold at Paris 2024
item.description: Taiwanese gymnast Tang Chia-hung has already won three gold medals at World Cup events this year. He's now looking to take the top of the Olympic podium in Paris this summer.
